name: Rutabaga Rush!
description:
You are a simple root vegetable, and you do not have the luxury of legs to jump. However, you have something better, roots! Roll and grapple with your roots in this unique platformer!

Made for Global Game Jam 2023!

Controls: 

A,D to roll

Mouse click to grapple

Esc,P to pause

A game by  Rainy Elephant Studios,  Farmerboy101, BekfastStealer,  and Adrian Connor
